title: LLand (Lollipop) Phone & Wear
summary: Help Andy and friends get through L Land in this delicious game!
description: The Androids don't like lollipops. Get past them to score higher than your friends.This game is based on Google's Android 5.0 (Lollipop) easter egg.Thanks to icons8 for the Android L Icon Pack!Features: * Use your google account to compare your score with other Androids all around the world! * Various difficulties. For more experienced and new Android players. * Choose a path: you can change your Android's direction, you can even go upside down! * You can choose from multiple backgrounds * Choose a Droid: Play with Andy, Brandy, Candy, Dandy, Handy, Kandy or Randy! * Change Andy's colorShare the game with your friends to help all the Androids get to Lollipop Land!
descriptionHTML:
The Androids don't like lollipops. Get past them to score higher than your friends.

This game is based on Google's Android 5.0 (Lollipop) easter egg.

Thanks to icons8 for the Android L Icon Pack!

Features:
* Use your google account to compare your score with other Androids all around the world!
* Various difficulties. For more experienced and new Android players.
* Choose a path: you can change your Android's direction, you can even go upside down!
* You can choose from multiple backgrounds
* Choose a Droid: Play with Andy, Brandy, Candy, Dandy, Handy, Kandy or Randy!
* Change Andy's color

Share the game with your friends to help all the Androids get to Lollipop Land!
comments: 75% ok Either remove the "hard" made or rename it to impossible.EVERY TIME I try to play on hard,I get killed,even if I'm 4 pixels away from the lollipillar.No need to be so hard.
Sweet Much better than the other lollipop game on the store. Bette graphics and sounds. Just the ads are annoying.
Ok I guess Doesn't work on s2,player dies b4 it touches the lollipop, great for trolling bets tho, most ppl think they can beat it
Great game Love playing on my phone and watch very smooth on my nexus 4 and with only a small bit of lag when playing on my lg g watch
3rd class faltu game I am saying please don't ever install this game
